name: Girlies Pink Suit Up
description:
This file was specifically made for the GirliesNFT project, to add a pink tuxedo on any Girlie (hair accounted for!) 😄 You can use this to show your support for #suitson4christies #TheTimeIsWoW #WoWAtChristies.


It's a very manual process though! And involves a bit of copy pasting and duplicating 😅


How to use:

  1. Go into the Dressing Room page
  2. Replace the Girlie image shown in the main frame to your Girlie!
  3. For the suit component, select the variant that matches your Girlie! (e.g. if you have a Girlie with a trait for Curtain Bangs, you select the Curtain Bangs variant)
  4. Also update the Girlie image in the Girlie layer in the suit component (so the right hair shows up in your overlay 😁)
  5. Export your Girlie as a PNG!


Included variants for the suit mask:

  • Base - for all Girlies that don't have hair that goes over their shoulders
  • Curtain Bangs
  • Cute Buns
  • Straight Bangs
  • Braids
  • Locs
  • Floral Braid
  • Hair Elf
